TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EndpointAddress extends System.Object

summary.span: Provides a unique network address that a client uses to communicate with a service endpoint.

span.span: Provides a unique network address that a client uses to communicate with a service endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 端點位址可唯一識別服務的端點。An endpoint address uniquely identifies the endpoint for a service. 端點位址屬於服務端點，其中也包含端點的繫結、合約及行為。The endpoint address belongs to the service endpoint, which also contains the binding, contract and behaviors for the endpoint. 包含 URI 和位址屬性，其中包括身分識別、WSDL 項目和選擇性標頭的集合。The contains a URI and address properties that include an identity, WSDL elements, and a collection of optional headers. 選擇性標頭會用於提供額外的詳細位址資訊，以便識別端點或與端點互動。The optional headers are used to provide additional, more detailed addressing information to identify or interact with the endpoint. 例如，當有多個可用的執行個體時，它們可以用於指出要使用哪一個服務執行個體來處理來自特定使用者的傳入訊息。For example, they can be used to indicate which instance of a service is to be used to process an incoming message from a particular user when multiple instances are available. 您可以強制使用程式碼，或是透過組態以宣告的形式來指定服務的端點位址。The endpoint address for a service can be specified either imperatively using code or declaratively through configuration. 在程式碼中定義端點通常不太實用，因為部署之服務的繫結和位址通常與開發服務時所使用的繫結和位址不同。Defining endpoints in code is usually not practical because the bindings and addresses for a deployed service are typically different from those used while the service is being developed. 它會比較實際定義服務端點使用的組態。It is more practical to define service endpoints using configuration. 不會實作 介面，因此無法加以序列化。 does not implement the interface and so is not serializable. 如果是要公開成為服務合約一部分的端點，它必須是可序列化，而且必須符合 Web 服務定址 (WS-Addressing) 通訊協定。For an endpoint to be exposed as part of a service contract it must be serializable and it must also be compliant with the Web Service Addressing (WS-Addressing) protocol. 和 類別會分別提供符合 WS-Addressing 的 1.0 版本和 August 2004 版本標準的可序列化端點。Serializable endpoints that are compliant with version 1.0 and the August 2004 version of WS-Addressing are provided, respectively, by the and classes. ## Examples [!code-csharp[EndpointAddress#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/endpointaddress/cs/hostapplication.cs#0)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks WS-Addressing 規格允許任意延伸項目出現在可使用 取得的端點參考 (EPR) 尾端。The WS-Addressing specification allows for arbitrary extension elements to appear at the end of an Endpoint Reference (EPR) that can be obtained using an . ## Examples 下列程式碼會示範如何具現化會指定 、、標頭集合、中繼資料 和延伸 的 ：The following code shows how to instantiate a that specifies a , an , a headers collection, a metadata and an extension . [!code-csharp[EndpointAddress#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/endpointaddress/cs/snippets.cs#6)]

summary.span: Gets a version-neutral representation of the anonymous URI.

span.span: Gets a version-neutral representation of the anonymous URI.
A with the value http://schemas.microsoft.com/2005/12/ServiceModel/Addressing/Anonymous.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果用於初始化建構函式之 URI 的值為 ，則 會設定為 `true`。If the value of the URI used to initialize the constructor is the , then is set to `true`. 是中性版本的類別，而 屬性會傳回中性表示的值。 is a version-neutral class and the property returns a value is a neutral representation. 當您將它寫出或轉換為某種版本時，它就會成為該版本的正確值。When you write this out or convert this to one version or the other, then it turns into the right value for that version. 由於目前網路技術的使用範圍極為廣泛 (例如，NAT、DHCP 和防火牆)，因此許多部署都無法為指定的端點指派有意義的全域 URI。Due to the range of network technologies currently in widespread use (for example, NAT, DHCP, and firewalls), many deployments cannot assign a meaningful global URI to a given endpoint. 若要允許這些*匿名*端點，以起始訊息交換模式，並收到回覆，Web 服務定址的規格會定義[URI](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96169)不能在穩定、 之端點所使用可解析的 URI。To allow these *anonymous* endpoints to initiate message exchange patterns and receive replies, the Web Services Addressing specification defines a [URI](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96169) for use by endpoints that cannot have a stable, resolvable URI. 使用這個位址的要求，必須提供某種機制以傳遞回覆或錯誤 (例如，傳回在相同傳輸連線上的回覆)。Requests that use this address must provide some mechanism for delivering replies or faults (for example, returning the reply on the same transport connection). 這種機制可以是要求/回覆傳輸通訊協定 (例如，HTTP GET 或 POST)。This mechanism can be a request/reply transport protocol (for example, HTTP GET or POST). 這個 URI 可以用來做為回覆訊息的目的地，但是不可做為其他情況下的目的地。This URI can be used as the destination for reply messages and should not be used as the destination in other circumstances. ## Examples [!code-csharp[EndpointAddress#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/endpointaddress/cs/snippets.cs#13)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將訊息的 "To" 設定成目前 的 。The method sets the "To" of the message with the of the current . 請記住，在此處的 "ApplyTo" 意指「將這個位址套用至訊息的 'To' 標頭」。Remember that "ApplyTo" means here "apply this address to the 'To' header of the message". ## Examples 下列程式碼會示範如何將端點位址的 URI 和屬性套用至訊息的標頭。The following code shows how to apply the URI and properties of an endpoint address to the headers of a message. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法，即可在從 將 URI 手動複製到 或 的 URI 時檢查 。Use this method to check for the when manually copying the URI from an to the URI of either a or a . 這項作業一定要完成，因為 和 都有特別的匿名值。This must be done because both and have special anonymous values. 如果正在複製匿名的 URI，使用者就必須使用這些值。Users must use these values if the URI being copied is anonymous. 由於目前網路技術的使用範圍極為廣泛 (例如，NAT、DHCP 和防火牆)，因此許多部署都無法為指定的端點指派有意義的全域 URI。Due to the range of network technologies currently in widespread use (for example, NAT, DHCP, and firewalls), many deployments cannot assign a meaningful global URI to a given endpoint. 若要允許這些*匿名*端點，以起始訊息交換模式，並收到回覆，Web 服務定址的規格會定義[URI](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96169)不能在穩定、 之端點所使用可解析的 URI。To allow these *anonymous* endpoints to initiate message exchange patterns and receive replies, the Web Services Addressing specification defines a [URI](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96169) for use by endpoints that cannot have a stable, resolvable URI. 使用這個位址的要求，必須提供某種機制以傳遞回覆或錯誤 (例如，傳回在相同傳輸連線上的回覆)。Requests that use this address must provide some mechanism for delivering replies or faults (for example, returning the reply on the same transport connection). 這種機制可以是要求/回覆傳輸通訊協定 (例如，HTTP GET 或 POST)。This mechanism can be a request/reply transport protocol (for example, HTTP GET or POST). 這個 URI 可以用來做為回覆訊息的目的地，但是不可做為其他情況下的目的地。This URI can be used as the destination for reply messages and should not be used as the destination in other circumstances. ## Examples [!code-csharp[EndpointAddress#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/endpointaddress/cs/snippets.cs#16)]
